callDetailRecord.description: Meta data supporting dialtone, ringdown, and shoutdown calls

callRecordType.description: The type of call that was made (dialtone, ringdown, shoutdown, etc)

audioInterface.description: The device as used to handle the call

callStartTime.description: Start time of the call in ISO 8601 UTC time time format

deviceInfo.description: Information about the device that generated this call record

userInfo.description: Information about the user who generated this call record

userName.description: The username he used on this system

firmName.description: Company name of the user who generated the call

timeZoneOffset.description: The UTC timezone offset for the user

recordingFile.description: Information about the recording associated with the call record

fileName.description: The name of the recording file as stored by Cloud9

properties.description: An MD5 hash of the recording file which is created when recorded and when stored in the S3 repository. The hash values are compared and, if they match, confirms that the data has not been altered.

universalCallID.description: Unique call ID for this call record. Will be unique across all Calls

groupId.description: The internal ID used for the group by the consumer. This will never change for the connection

groupName.description: Name of the group for the call. It may changed by the nearEnd Firm

buttonName.description: The name on the consuming app for the connection

offset.description: For shoutdowns, the offset in the recording for this call. Shoutdown recordings may include more than one call Record

duration.description: The duration of the call in seconds

startTime.description: The time when the call started

stopTime.description: The time when the call terminated

participants.description: Specific details about the farEndUsers (the other end of the call)

firmName.description: Name of the farEnd firm on the call. If an internal call, the firmName can match the nearEnd firm

groupId.description: The internal ID used by consumer for the farEnd group. This will never change for the connection

groupName.description: Name of the farEnd group for the call. It may changed by the farEnd Firm

farEndName.description: The name (first and last) of the farEnd User on the call
